translation.en: [reporter 1] Good day.
translation.vi: [reporter 1] Good day.

translation.en: [reporter 1] …it has been claimed that CW-7 is the answer to global warming.
translation.vi: [reporter 1] …it has been claimed that CW-7 is the answer to global warming.

translation.en: And we are witnessing…
translation.vi: And we are witnessing…

translation.en: -Dory! -[soldier 3] Sit down! Everyone!
translation.vi: -Dory! -[soldier 3] Sit down! Everyone!

translation.en: [soldier 3] Stay in line.
translation.vi: [soldier 3] Stay in line.

translation.en: Give us it. Give us it.
translation.vi: Give us it. Give us it.

translation.en: Listen, I'm not saying I want that to happen. That's not what I'm saying.
translation.vi: Listen, I'm not saying I want that to happen. That's not what I'm saying.

translation.en: [soldier 3] That's right. Go join the others.
translation.vi: [soldier 3] That's right. Go join the others.

translation.en: [Edgar] Timmy! Timmy!
translation.vi: [Edgar] Timmy! Timmy!

translation.en: Right, I got it. I got it.
translation.vi: Right, I got it. I got it.

translation.en: [soldier 1] Left. Then right.
translation.vi: [soldier 1] Left. Then right.

translation.en: Now or never! Coming now! Coming now!
translation.vi: Now or never! Coming now! Coming now!

translation.en: [soldier 1] You want him fucking dead. Is that it? Keep quiet!
translation.vi: [soldier 1] You want him fucking dead. Is that it? Keep quiet!

translation.en: Are you Namgoong Minsoo? Security specialist?
translation.vi: Are you Namgoong Minsoo? Security specialist?

translation.en: -[man in Japanese] Wilford forever! -[soldiers in Japanese] Forever! Forever!
translation.vi: -[man in Japanese] Wilford forever! -[soldiers in Japanese] Forever! Forever!

translation.en: Go! Go! Go!
translation.vi: Go! Go! Go!

translation.en: I don't know. I don't know.
translation.vi: I don't know. I don't know.

translation.en: Don't mind me. Back to work, everyone. Back to work.
translation.vi: Don't mind me. Back to work, everyone. Back to work.

translation.en: Mr. Wilford's love of locomotives was apparent.
translation.vi: Mr. Wilford's love of locomotives was apparent.

translation.en: ♪ We all freeze and die! ♪
translation.vi: ♪ We all freeze and die! ♪

translation.en: ♪ But will it stop? Oh, will it stop? ♪
translation.vi: ♪ But will it stop? Oh, will it stop? ♪

translation.en: ♪ No, no! ♪
translation.vi: ♪ No, no! ♪

translation.en: ♪ Can you tell us why? ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Can you tell us why? ♪

translation.en: ♪ The engine is eternal, yes! ♪
translation.vi: ♪ The engine is eternal, yes! ♪

translation.en: ♪ The engine is forever, yes! ♪
translation.vi: ♪ The engine is forever, yes! ♪

translation.en: ♪ Rumble, rumble, rattle, rattle ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Rumble, rumble, rattle, rattle ♪

translation.en: ♪ Who is the reason why? ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Who is the reason why? ♪

translation.en: ♪ Wilford, yeah! ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Wilford, yeah! ♪

translation.en: ♪ Wilford! Wilford! Hip-hooray! ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Wilford! Wilford! Hip-hooray! ♪

translation.en: It wasn't me! It wasn't me!
translation.vi: It wasn't me! It wasn't me!

translation.en: [soldier 1] God, that does not look good.
translation.vi: [soldier 1] God, that does not look good.

translation.en: [in Korean] Kronole first. Kronole, Kronole.
translation.vi: [in Korean] Kronole first. Kronole, Kronole.

translation.en: [in Korean] What the hell's wrong with you? You and your fucking gates.
translation.vi: [in Korean] What the hell's wrong with you? You and your fucking gates.

translation.en: This snow is about to melt.
translation.vi: This snow is about to melt.

translation.en: You gotta take it easy on that Kronole.
translation.vi: You gotta take it easy on that Kronole.

translation.en: You are the first human being to have walked the total length of this train.
translation.vi: You are the first human being to have walked the total length of this train.

translation.en: [in Korean] Yona. We need to open the gate and get the Kronole!
translation.vi: [in Korean] Yona. We need to open the gate and get the Kronole!

translation.en: [in Korean] Yona! The Kronole!
translation.vi: [in Korean] Yona! The Kronole!
